org.settings4j.connector.db.dao
Interface SettingsDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
SettingsDAOHibernate
public interface SettingsDAO

Settings DAO (Data Access Object) with common methods.

Implements this interface if you want create DAO's for SettingsDTO objects.

Method Summary

          Method to get an object based on class and identifier.

          Method to get an object based on class and key.

          Method to delete an object based on class and id.

          Method to store a SettingsDTO - handles both update and insert.

getById

SettingsDTO getById(Long id)
Method to get an object based on class and identifier. An ObjectRetrievalFailureException Runtime Exception is thrown if nothing is found.

Returns:
a populated object
See Also:

getByKey

SettingsDTO getByKey(String key)
Method to get an object based on class and key. Returns null if nothing is found.

Parameters:

Returns:
the SettingsDTO.

org.springframework.orm.ObjectRetrievalFailureException

store

void store(SettingsDTO settingsDTO)
Method to store a SettingsDTO - handles both update and insert.

Parameters:
settingsDTO - the SettingsDTO to save.
